summary: A stockbroker working with a crime syndicate is hurt in a car accident while attempting to evade a surveillance operative.
cast: Louis Koo|Ching Wan Lau|Daniel Wu|Michelle Ye|Yi Huang|Kenneth Tsang|Fung Woo|Ying Kwan Lok|Wilfred Lau|Hin-Wai Au|Joman Chiang|Chiao Chiao|Matt Chow|Alex Fong|Chi-Kui Fong|Ai Kong|Fung Kwok|Chi-Wai Lai|Chi-Bok Lam|Dion Lam|Wai-Kai Law|Bo-Chun Mak|Wai-Ming Pang|Patricia Tang|Chi-Wang Wong|King-Man Yip|Ben Yuen|Jane Wong
title: Sit ting fung wan 2
